# [Interview #26: Compuserve Chat, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=26#4)

#### Sharon Perdue

Is there any specific reason why there isn't a name given to the continent in which Rand and Co. inhabit?

#### Robert Jordan

Simply because people don't generally give names to their homes that wayâ€”it's other places they give names to.
